column4: Hi, I need an alternative to nm-applet for umts connections as nm-applet will not recognize my umts modem after I unpluged it and pluged it in again
if you're sure its an nm-applet problem, the only alternative i am aware of is wicd
ActionParsnip; It's just not working, also on other machines it will always show "never" in the last time connected" field and generally isn't reliable
that doesn't necessarily meanits an nm-applet proble
